pages.text: Your pickaxe, which was sinfully expensive to enchant? Almost broken and each additional broken block hurts your nerves more than the tool itself.$(br)May the tool not be able to be rescued, at least the Enchantments will! This canvas can not only capture color: Used on a tool, the enchantments are exchanged.

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: Once used, an image of the item you used it on will be drawn on the canvas, never be removed again, binding it to this type of item.
